overview:
Sean Spooner is a young British entrepreneur. Sean co-founded Corby Magazine in May 2010 and was named the world’s youngest publisher along with his business partner Louis Porter.

Sean is currently finishing school, at Brooke Weston Academy in the East Midlands.

Since the creation of Corby Magazine, Sean has started to explore and found a variety of local internet based startups, including Photo Corby and Your Corby; both were designed as experiments to see how local people would adopt to local attractions on the internet.

In May 2011 Sean was set a challenge by a school teacher. Sean had to make a business with a total budget of Â£10. The following day Sean returned to his school teacher with a website that he had created, Lifein140. Lifein140 encouraged users to tell their life stories in one tweet. Sean sold Lifein140 two weeks after it launched, after a considerable amount of viral traffic.

In August of 2010 Sean joined the newly founded news and lifestyle blog Only Insider, taking up the role of editor in chief.
